entries.journal_entry_description: Brantlee Spondoon has requested your help in meeting with an informant who claims to have important information concerning the current administration. Help obtain the informant's data.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: Your services have been requested by Brantlee Spondoon, aide to the Diktat. Report to her at once. Brantlee is in the capitol building in Coronet.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Go speak with the government informant and retrieve the data that Brantlee needs. The informant will remain nameless and will await you in a small warehouse in Coronet.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: Before going unconscious, the informant told you of a hiding place with a datadisk that holds the data you are to retrieve. Go get it and hurry.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: The informant's hidden stash is empty. It's fairly obvious that the Rogue CorSec in the area found the stash and emptied it.
entries.task03_message_box_text: The informant's hidden stash is empty. It's fairly obvious that the Rogue CorSec in the area found the stash and emptied it.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: The Rogue CorSec in the area got to the informant's stash before you could. The ones still in the area may have some important information or clues on them. Defeat some of the Rogue CorSecs and see if you find anything.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: After defeating the rogue CorSec troopers, you found a datapad on one of them. This would probably be of interest to Lt. Jasper. Try logging onto it.
entries.task06_message_box_text: After defeating the rogue CorSec troopers, you found a datapad on one of them. Try logging onto it.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: After you defeated the rogue CorSec troopers, you found a datapad on one of them. Try to log onto it.
entries.task07_journal_entry_title: Log onto the Rogue CorSec Datapad
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: After trying multiple times to log onto the datapad, you give up. But it looks like something Lt. Jasper should see.
entries.task08_message_box_text: After trying multiple times to log onto the datapad, you give up because you can't get past its security. It looks like something Lt. Jasper should see, but return to Brantlee before going to Lt. Jasper and don't mention the datapad to her.
entries.task09_journal_entry_description: First, return to Brantlee Spondoon in the capitol building and let her know what happened to the informant. Do not say too much until you've had a chance to report to Lt. Jasper, especially about the datapad you found.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Bring the Rogue CorSec datapad to Lt. Jasper.
entries.task10_journal_entry_title: Bring the Datapad to Lt. Jasper
